title: I'll Never Leave You Anymore

tokens.lyric: I'll never leave you anymore,

lines.raw: [E]I'll never leave you anymore,

tokens.lyric: For I have found in your bright eyes

lines.raw: [A]For I have found in your bright eyes

tokens.lyric: A river of love, a heart of gold,

lines.raw: [E]A river of love, a heart of gold,

tokens.lyric: A peaceful mind, a hand to hold.

lines.raw: [C#m]A peaceful mind, a hand to hold.

tokens.lyric: And what I'll do with this precious gift?

lines.raw: [B7]And what I'll do with this precious gift?

tokens.lyric: Shall I embrace it to myself?

lines.raw: [E]Shall I embrace it to myself?

tokens.lyric: Oh, no I can't, I would lose it sure;

lines.raw: [A]Oh, no I can't, I would lose it sure;

tokens.lyric: It must be given if it's to endure.

lines.raw: [E]It must be given if it's to endure.

tokens.lyric: And how will I use this treasure store?

lines.raw: [A]And how will I use this treasure store?

tokens.lyric: How will I share this wordless joy?

lines.raw: [E]How will I share this wordless joy?

tokens.lyric: I'll greet all men with a loving heart;

lines.raw: [C#m]I'll greet all men with a loving heart;

tokens.lyric: I'll speak the truth with a clear voice.

lines.raw: [B7]I'll speak the truth with a clear voice.

tokens.lyric: And together we'll build a world that's new.

lines.raw: [E]And together we'll build a world that's new.

tokens.lyric: That's fit for kings and fit for queens;

lines.raw: [A]That's fit for kings and fit for queens;

tokens.lyric: We'll raise them up to rule the land,

lines.raw: [E]We'll raise them up to rule the land,

tokens.lyric: And place dominion in your hand.

lines.raw: [C#m]And place dominion in your hand.

tokens.lyric: I'll never leave you anymore,

lines.raw: [B7]I'll never leave you anymore,

tokens.lyric: For I have found in your bright eyes

lines.raw: [E]For I have found in your bright eyes

tokens.lyric: A river of love, a heart of gold,

lines.raw: [A]A river of love, a heart of gold,

tokens.lyric: A peaceful mind, a hand to hold.

lines.raw: [E]A peaceful mind, a hand to hold.
